title: Unstable ping
body:
Hello,

For the last two months or so I've been having this problem. When I start a game my ping is normal. Then I start another game and my ping is double what it was the first game. If I play another game my ping maintains doubled. If I play a 4th game my ping usually goes down to the normal ping. And if I play a 5th game my normal ping gets doubled again.

Has this happened to anyone? Does anyone know how can I fix this?

replies.body: What are your computer specs? Do you connect wirelessly? Who is your ISP and what kind of service do you have(what are the advertised speeds)?

I live in South America. Been playing this game for almost two years. Never had this issue. It all started around June or July this year. I don't connect wirelessly. My connection speed is 15mbps, with a pseudo fiber optic service.

Hey Pro Lover, 

You may have luck with Riot's Connection KB and it should help with your high Ping issue. Why not give it a try and if that doesn't seem to fix the issue feel free to reach out to me so I can try to help. 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
